lead_paragraph: Guard Ben Hansbrough, who helped Mississippi State advance to the second round of the N.C.A.A. tournament last month, is transferring to Notre Dame. Hansbrough is the younger brother of North Carolina forward Tyler Hansbrough.
snippet: Guard Ben Hansbrough, who helped Mississippi State advance to the second round of the N.C.A.A. tournament last month, is transferring to Notre Dame. Hansbrough is the younger brother of North Carolina forward Tyler Hansbrough.
